solution_line_template: The total amount of cookies he can eat in a day is {cookies_per_time} x {times_per_day} = <<{cookies_per_time}*{times_per_day}={cookies_per_day}>>{cookies_per_day}.
The total amount of cookies he can eat in a month is {cookies_per_day} x {days_per_month} = <<{cookies_per_day}*{days_per_month}={cookies_per_month}>>{cookies_per_month}.
Therefore, the total amount of cookies he can eat in {num_months} months is {cookies_per_month} x {num_months} = <<{cookies_per_month}*{num_months}={total_cookies}>>{total_cookies}.
